formatted_address: 1 Marine Parade Central, Parkway Centre, Singapura 449408
name: Huayi Cultural Education Centre

reviews.text: Huayi Cultural Edu Centre, a professional Chinese education centre, was established in 2009. The Founders, one is a former China Primary School teacher and the other is a former MOE Secondary School teacher with more than 8 years of local experience in teaching and preparing pupils for the PSLE and O level Chinese Language Examination.

Definitely recommended
The teachers at Huayi teach very well. My child likes the teachers here very much. He got A star in psle and will continue to come here for Sec1 next year:)
My child loves the nice teachers here and scored A star in psle this year and will continue in Sec1 next year.

vicinity: 1 Marine Parade Central, Parkway Centre, Singapura
